name: overmedicated
text: 'Making pickles' has irrevocably entered my vernacular. Thanks.

name: billylk
text: I like "Did a Roseanne" even more.

name: neonaoneo
text: A comment left by neonaoneo was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, twntysevn27, stanshall, professorhazard, Thorfinn, Deusoma, CK421, mustconcentrate, fakedaisies, aHatOfPig, rational, Doc_Rostov, clintisiceman)

name: apocowarg
text: Because the Achewood experience is made out of concentrated awesome. There's a couple of people that take the "I SAY THIS ALL THE TIME" a little too far though. Every other word out of their mouth would have be an Achewood quote which would either get them punched in the face or revered as a genius.

name: neonaoneo
text:
Yeah it is awesome I completely agree, but still, it's annoying as you said to read every comic and find four or five people saying 'I use this line EVERY DAY' or 'I use this line to my MOM'. They probably don't, but think that saying it makes them somehow cooler to the Achewood crowd.

I ain't bagging on Achewood though, hear me out, I'm on your side.

name: hipjiverobot
text: I'll give you a chubby to balance out your lames on the first comment.

name: nause
text: All driving with the cat turd steaming up the windows.

name: antsama
text: Oh man, I cannot stop laughing at the idea of shooting that sheet in the woods.

name: spinynorman
text: Anyone else think of that scene from Miller's Crossing when it came to this?

name: dickie_roxx
text: Actually, yes.  Sheet all sobbin and cryin.  Beef all stoic and Irish.

name: spinynorman
text:
That's it. I will no longer be able to think of John Turturro without imagining two cats smuggling shit out of a cheap motel.

And I like Barton Fink, too. :(

name: professorhazard
text: Number two with a bullet.

name: mattylite
text: My mind turned to dust just there.

name: irondave
text: You're a bad, bad man.

name: saint
text: ...brings whole new meaning to "shot the shit" doesn't it?

name: jthm_guitarist
text: I wish I could hear batman yell that.

name: centipede_damascus
text: A comment left by centipede_damascus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Thorfinn, goocifer, aquamuffin)

name: jstegall
text: I'm pretty sure it's okay to do it in a motel bed just not a hotel.

name: daidai
text: motels expect it

name: weretrout
text: I nearly shot milk out of my nose. Chubby.

name: sargasm
text: "Police may have found a new victim in the Sheet Shit Murders.  Story at 11"

name: killerlimpet
text: I know people who would be copycat criminals.

name: mrmacky
text: Beef knows Ray. Ray's question in panel one could only mean one thing.

name: geysershitdick
text: It's surprising he didn't smell it first.

name: rizzle
text: The last line is golden, one of the best Achewood one liners

name: nurdbot
text: Ouch, Poor Beef must have one hella bad credit card rating.

name: cicadalek
text: I think it probably had more to do with the L.I.N.C.O.L.N. getup he was wearing at the time

name: clembot
text: the fact that the car drives away into the distance as he says "a turd with a bullet..." is comic genius

name: tinhand
text: I mean imagine if you're walking through the woods on a summers day just as a family outing and just to the side of the path you find a shit covered sheet with a bullet sticking out the top. You would have to ask yourself questions.

name: tinhand
text: Also why the hell would you shoot it?

name: honesttom
text: You want to make damn sure it won't come after you.

name: i_love_kate
text: That was succulent.

name: ampkit5
text: "Making pickles" is not, nor shall ever be "succulent".

name: heccibiggs
text: STOP

name: songbirdspectre
text: The bearded cat is so angry. So disappointed.

name: molesticide
text:
Packin' Dream Lunches.

Ray's instinctual response to this situation is flight.

Beef's is to hide the evidence.

It is excrement, in a sheet.

I REALLY like that once Beef decides to shoot the turd, he sticks unwaveringly to his choice- there is really no other reasonable thing to do.

name: talix18
text: I thought Beef gave all his cash to Showbiz.

name: clever-nickname
text: this is what should've happened in Trainspotting when Spud shat himself.

name: caseyb3
text:
What the hell 5 O'Clock news does Beef watch?

I guess that is the sort of misconception you get about local news if your TV is PBS.

name: rumblefish
text: "It's wrapped in a sheet and left in the woods. Find out what hot new fad is threatening the lives of your children tonight at 5."

name: dasilodavi
text: I heard somewhere that Val Kilmer does the same thing to his hotel sheets.

name: mountaindewtab
text: pickles! hahaha. why would he call it pickles.

name: geysershitdick
text: I think it's because Ray not only pooed (cucumber) the bed, but also peed (brine) in it.

name: heccibiggs
text: ewww!

name: dudesstew
text: Turd Murder would be a good name for a punk band.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: Crust Punk all the way.

name: shoinan
text: Oh man - the realisation that your partner in crime was so blinkered last night that he left his brown mark all over the hotel sheets - it's awful. Stanky boy, that Smuckles.

name: qatmandu
text: The last line is comedy gold!

name: slimpickens
text: Roast Beef of all people should understand the fear of having his turds DNA-tested.

name: leggotheego
text: So Hilarious.

name: sharpdresseddan
text: "Man, let's get outta here!" made me laugh so much. it's straight out of a movie or something.

name: red-barchetta
text: Ray looks so hung over in this strip. I feel for ya bro!

name: severide
text: The Turd Murderers would make an excellent band name.

name: severide
text: FUCK. Someone beat me to it.

name: rubber_baron
text:
animals think
they're pretty smart
shit on the ground
see in the dark

name: mikeronomicon
text: The thought of driving out to the middle of now where to put a bullet in a turd made me laugh loud enough that my boss had to talk to me about "work appropriate" behavior.

name: mustakrakesh
text: The wine so bad that it made a turd that made the news.

name: bozendoka
text:
I just started reading from the beginning, and I've been ambivalent about creating an account. This strip, however, removed any choice I had in the matter. It brought me, literally, to tears. Tears of hilarity.

Not, you know, the other kind.

name: miaou
text: Anyone like me who thought the bags Ray has under his eyes actually were his eyes?!

name: berami
text: Between the two grand (and change) he gave Showbiz and paying for this hotel room, Beef carries a LOT of cash.
